description: People catch Zika virus by being bitten by an infected Aedes mosquito
title: How do people catch the Zika virus?
content:
Zika is a disease caused by the Zika virus. It is primarily spread by mosquitos, but it can also be passed from an infected woman, if she is pregnant, to her fetus, and from one sexual partner to another during unprotected sex.

For the most current and complete information on ZIka in the U.S., please visit the CDC's website at http://www.cdc.gov/zika/
